transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir ab aawaz aa rahi hai aapko saaf se.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai sir, phone pe mujhe message.
Customer: Ji ji, ji Pratik ji maine aapko video, video meeting ki link bhej di aapke. Nahi sir video meeting kis cheez ke liye chahiye sir ye bataiye aap pehle wo mere ko.
Executive: Sir main aapko us cheez ke bare mein bata deta hu jo aap on call discussion hota hai aur jo sir video meeting mein screen share karke discussion hoga us cheez mein sir different rahega. Effective rahegi cheeze aur aapko thoda main samjhane, samjha hi paunga achi tarike se aur main.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir ye last hai, ye last hai, main aapko samay de de raha hu main abhi laptop on kar raha hu aapka app on kar raha hu aap do minute mein call back kijiye lekin agar aap end se proper nahi raha to iske baad mein sir aap main sirf app delete kar dunga aur mujhe koi aapki wapis matlab communication ki bhi jarurat nahi hai sir. Main abhi ye last time aapko time de raha hu ye kar diya maine. Silli silli requirement aati hai abhi aaj ek kisi ka kapda ladke le aa gayi.
Customer: Kya requirement aati hai aapke IndiaMART pe mujhe kuch yehi nahi samajh raha.
Executive: Kya bol rahe ho sir?
Customer: Hold kijiye sir main abhi laptop on kiya hu mera aapka app open karta hu. Laptop mein karu na ki phone mein karu?
Executive: Phone mein kar lijiye ya laptop pe kar lijiye koi dikkat nahi hai kisi bhi cheez mein.
Customer: Phone mein karunga to fir baat nahi ho payegi aapse.
Executive: Haan to laptop pe kar lijiye sir available ho laptop agar aapka.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji laptop pe khol lijiye kholte kholte rahiye sir.
Customer: Haan hold rakhiye theek hai.

Customer: Link bhejiye sir aap whatsapp pe.
Customer: Vansh Tomar ji.
Executive: Ji ji boliye.
Customer: Aap link whatsapp pe bhejenge mail pe bhejenge kya karenge?
Executive: Link, link aapke registered mail ID pe aayi hogi but agar aap kahoge to main whatsapp pe share kar dunga aapko.
Customer: Nahi koi baat nahi sir aapne register whatsapp pe kar dijiye sir easy ho jayega mere liye.
Executive: Ji ji call pe rahiye main whatsapp pe bhejta hu aapko.
Customer: Ye aur shayad rakshiro hai leke padta.


Customer: Sir bhejiye aapne whatsapp pe link?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir bhej raha hu sir ek minute rukiye bhej raha hu.

Executive: Dekhiye aapko hello aaya hoga whatsapp pe.
Customer: Ji sir aapke whatsapp pe bhej diya 909. Haan sir ek minute upload, upload ho raha hai.
Customer: Ye baap wo diamond sir mere wale call kar rahe hai wo 50000 cash bhi jaa raha hai mere number pe.
Customer: Wo chokku wapis phone lagana bhaiya phone pe karna hoga to bhaiya aise baat kar lo mere number pe kar diya to bhi jayega.

Customer: Bhaiya ko pani pilao.


Customer: Haan ye to fir cash mein kar liya aapne open system mein. Sir ek minute actually laptop mein whatsapp on hone mein time lag raha hai. Abhi teen char din ka karega pura data. Koi nahi koi nahi kariye kariye.
Executive: Aa gaya sir haan abhi main.

Executive: Ji sir aa gaya main online.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir boliye. Hello.
Customer: Abhi aa gaya sir main online bataiye. Aapne jo link bheji google meet ki main aa gaya usme.
Executive: Ji ji google meeting ki link bheji hai to open karke join kar lijiye.
Customer: Aa gaya ek second. Ye kar deta hu. Sir system pe baat karte hai waha pe laptop se.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi sir kariye laptop se.
Customer: Okay sir yes yes sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know the purpose of video meeting.

- Customer is facing issues with IndiaMART requirements.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the difference between on-call and video discussion.

- Executive sent the Google Meet link on WhatsApp.

- Customer joined the Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, whatsapp, google meet, requirements
